coding_practice.title: Reverse Words in a String III
coding_practice.description: Given a string s, reverse the order of characters in each word within a sentence while still preserving whitespace and initial word order.
coding_practice.constraints:
1 <= s.length <= 5 * 10^4
s contains printable ASCII characters.
s does not contain any leading or trailing spaces.
There is at least one word in s.
All the words in s are separated by a single space.
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 使用 split(' ') 將字串以空白分隔成多個單字。
2. 對每個單字 word 使用切片語法 word[::-1] 反轉字元順序。
3. 使用 join 將反轉後的單字重新以空白連接成完整句子。
4. 保留原本的空白間隔與單字順序。
